GSD.product_version: versions from v5.15.61 to before v5.15.64
GSD.description:
binder_alloc: add missing mmap_lock calls when using the VMA

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.64 by commit 577d9c05cc48c5242bcf719c06a5baf3105473ad, it was introduced in version v5.15.61 by commit 622ef885a89ad04cfb76ee478fb44f051125d1f1. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: binder_alloc: add missing mmap_lock calls when using the VMA
